* Bill de hOra <bill@...> [2007-03-04 18:00]:
> I think "APP" could be confusing, but it's handier than typing
> in "Atom Protocol".

The term’s main failing is googlability. Expanding only the first
letter yields “AtomPP” which is specific, seems to have been
invented independently by multiple different people and is
already in some use on the web.

Regards,
--
